title: Ghost game
body: I ended an aram about 10 mins ago and wont let me join my friends lobby, restart client, and i'm now stuck trying to reconnect to a game that does not exist when i disconnect it wont let me do anything other than try to reconnect to this ghost game

replies.body: Hey, we've been tracking this on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page while investigating these ghost games.  It looks like things are starting to settle!
Same problem here, I just ended Onslaught.
